page.title: 27A day in a life.
page.content:
Today is Saturday. I got out of my bed and went down stairs for breakfast. I had a chocolate sandwich for breakfast and some hot milk mmm it was lovely.

After I went upstairs got change in a track suit because I was getting ready to go Ice –Skating with my friend Zoe. (People think we are twins.)

When we arrived at ice skating we put our own boots on and started practising for the big day. (Show.)

In our show we are dancing to ‘California Girls’ by Katy Perry. We had to do it 10 times. When we finished we played a game called the Octopus.

Zoe wanted a Doo Doo bird so I got it for her.

We got some sweets called Strawberry Laces mmm it was yummy.

Soon we had to go home we dropped off Zoe and then went back home. Now for a relaxing time.


Pupil-Montbelle School
